author: Al Jazeera
title: Barcelona players including Messi take pay cut amid virus crisis
description: As fatalities and the number of coronavirus patients soar in Spain, football club cuts salaries of players and staff.
content:
FC Barcelona is taking measures to cut the wages of its players and staff to reduce the economic effects of the coronavirus crisis, the club said on Thursday.
All professional players at Barcelona, including Lionel Messi, as well as non-playing staff, will f… [+1738 chars]
